detail_desc: Fitted polo-neck top in soft modal jersey with long sleeves.
Boxy-style top in cotton sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves with decorative seams, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Metal hair clips in various designs. Length 4.5-5 cm.
Fully lined, V-neck swimsuit with light, removable pads in the cups, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and an opening with lacing at the back.

Short, A-line parka in twill made from a cotton blend with a drawstring hood, zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front and flap front pockets with a press-stud. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with an adjustable tab and press-stud at the cuffs, and a drawstring hem. Lined.
Short shorts in a patterned weave with a detachable tie belt, side pockets, and soft, wide jersey ribbing at the waist for optimum comfort.
Knee-length sports shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist, and a key pocket in the waistband. Unlined.
Scarf in a soft, fine knit with fringes on the short sides.
Short-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with hard-worn details, a ribbed neckline and raw edges at the sleeves and hem.

NATHALIE LÉTÉ x H&M. Sandals in patterned imitation leather with an adjustable tab with a metal fastener at the front, an adjustable ankle strap with a hook and loop fastening, and a loop at the back. Moulded imitation suede insoles and fluted thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Straight-cut T-shirt in soft jersey with a slightly deeper neckline, chest pocket and rounded hem with short slits in the sides.
Knitted jacket with a soft thermal fleece lining, hood and small appliqué at the top. Zip down the front, side pockets and a contrasting colour jersey trim around the hood, pockets, cuffs and hem.
Lightly padded jacket in woven fabric with a matt, brushed finish. Pile-lined hood with sewn-on ears at the top, a diagonal zip down the front and concealed elastication at the cuffs. Lined.
Sports jacket in fast-drying functional fabric with a mesh-lined hood and zip down the front with a chin guard. Front pockets and long raglan sleeves. Soft brushed inside.
Fully lined, patterned bikini bottoms with a low waist.

Long-sleeved body in lace with a lined front, round neckline and an opening with a covered button at the back of the neck. Seam with a jersey lower section, a lined gusset, and concealed press-studs at the crotch.
Jumper in a soft, textured-knit cotton blend with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Baby Exclusive. Two-piece set with a top and pair of leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey. Top with a press-stud on one shoulder, long raglan sleeves and overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem. Leggings with soft elastication at the waist, and overlocked edges at the hems.
Joggers in soft jersey made from an organic cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and cuffed hems.
V-neck jumper in a soft knit with dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Windbreaker in woven fabric with a mesh-lined, drawstring hood, zip down the front, jetted side pockets and an inner pocket. Sturdy ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Mesh lining.

Cardigan in cotton sweatshirt fabric with an embroidered text detail on the chest, ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front and welt side pockets. Long sleeves with contrasting colour stripes down the sides and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Jumper in soft, fine-knit slub cotton with a boat neck, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with roll edges at the cuffs. Narrow ribbing around the neckline and hem and short slits in the sides. Longer at the back.

Short, sleeveless dress with a V-neck. Sewn-in wrapover at the front with a concealed press-stud at the top and a strap with D-rings at one side. Seam at the waist and a visible zip at the back. Lined.
T-shirt in patterned cotton jersey.
High-waisted briefs in microfibre with a laser-cut edges, a lined gusset and string back. The briefs have a light sculpting effect on the tummy, waist and hips.
Long-sleeved tops in soft organic cotton jersey with lapped shoulders.
Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved bodysuit in soft, lightweight wool jersey with press-studs on the shoulders and at the crotch.
Sunglasses with patterned acetate frames and UV-protective, polarised lenses. Supplied in a fabric storage pouch.
Slim-fit trousers in stretch twill made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend with a regular waist, side pockets, flap leg pockets and fake flap pockets at the back.
Pleated, calf-length skirt in woven fabric with a high, elasticated waist. Unlined.
Sandals with crossover straps at the front and an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles with a braided jute trim. Heel approx. 7 cm.
Jumper in fine-knit merino wool with a V-neck and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Leggings in stretch cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Silk tie in a grosgrain weave. Width 7 cm.

Sandals in imitation leather with glittery details and an appliqué at the top, heel cap with a padded edge and an adjustable ankle strap with a hook and loop fastening. Imitation leather insoles and fluted soles.
Straight-style jumper in a knit made partly from recycled polyester with a rib-knit polo neck. Dropped shoulders, ribbing at the cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved top in a crêpe weave with a lace yoke, round neckline, an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck and a rounded hem.
Socks in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops. Sizes 3-9 with anti-slip protectors.
Short-sleeved nightdress in printed jersey made from a cotton blend with a round neckline and rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Soft microfibre bra top in a narrow cut at the top with a hook-and-eye fastener at the back and decorative metal rings at the front.
Trousers in washed cotton twill with a soft, brushed finish. Elasticated waist, side pockets, a back pocket and tapered legs.

Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, wrapover hood, contrasting colour seams, embroidery at the front and a kangaroo pocket. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in soft jersey made from an organic cotton blend with a double-layered drawstring hood and kangaroo pocket. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Balconette bra in microfibre and lace with underwired, padded cups that lift and shape. Narrow, detachable shoulder straps that can be fastened in several different ways and a fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with short puff sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Shirt in woven fabric with a collar and buttons down the front. Chest pocket, yoke at the back and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Slightly shorter jumper in a soft double knit with a round neckline, dropped shoulders, long balloon sleeves with close-fitting ribbing at the cuffs, and a ribbed hem.
Long-sleeved tops in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend.
Long-sleeved top in cotton jersey with a polo neck. Slim Fit – a fit that shapes in at the chest and tapers at the waist. This, combined with slightly narrower sleeves, creates a fitted silhouette.
V-neck blouse in a crinkled weave with 3/4-length sleeves with flounced cuffs, and a flounce at the hem.

department_name: Sneakers big girl inactive from s2
detail_desc: Trainers with a padded edge and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Straight jumper in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with a slightly wider neckline, dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
5-pocket skirt in washed, stretch cotton denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, slit at the front and raw-edge hem. The cotton content of the skirt is partly recycled.
Heart-shaped bag in imitation patent leather with a zip at the top and a metal chain shoulder strap. Recycled polyester lining. Depth 3 cm. Width 10.5 cm. Height 11 cm.
Short, high-waisted shorts in a soft weave with a detachable tie belt, concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Pleats at the top, side pockets and a fake back pocket.
Sports trousers in windproof functional fabric with contrasting colour details. Elasticated waist, zipped side pockets, a reflective print on one leg and elasticated hems.
Hairband in a cotton weave with embroidery, a decorative bow at the front and covered elastic at the back.
V-neck cardigan in a soft, chunky knit containing some wool with buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Top in a patterned viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Jumper in a textured cotton knit containing some merino wool with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Shopper in imitation suede with an imitation leather lower section. Handles and a magnetic fastener at the top, a detachable, adjustable shoulder strap and a zipped outer compartment. Lined. Size approx. 36x39 cm.

Top in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise, a wide, frill-trimmed V-neck and silicone trim at the shoulders. Short, scalloped sleeves, a concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist and a gently flared, scalloped peplum.
Push-up bra in lace with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.

Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool. Relaxed fit with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves with a decorative seam at the bottom, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Pleated trousers in jersey with a slight sheen. High elasticated waist and wide, straight legs with raw-edge hems.
Short coat in felted fabric containing some recycled wool with notch lapels, concealed buttons at the front, welt side pockets and a tie belt at the waist. Recycled polyester lining.
Pyjamas with a strappy top and shorts in soft, patterned jersey. Short top with narrow shoulder straps. Shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Top in soft cotton jersey with a button placket, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
High-waisted lace briefs with a lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Cotton canvas trainers with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Leather monkstraps with a tab and metal buckle at the front. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Balconette bra in microfibre and lace with underwired, padded cups that lift and shape the bust and provide extra-firm support. Detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Cap in cotton twill with a reversible sequin motif on the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.

Cropped top in crinkled jersey with smocking at the back, a sweetheart neckline and a drawstring down the front to create a draped effect. Long puff sleeves with elastication over the shoulders and at the cuffs. The polyester content of the top is partly recycled.
Scarf in a soft, thin weave with fringed trims.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem and dropped shoulders with decorative lacing. Soft brushed inside.
